org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding

Enum BindMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BindMode>
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding.BindMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BindMode>

    public enum BindMode
extends java.lang.Enum<BindMode>
    Specifies the direction of a Binding.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BIDIRECTIONAL
      Makes a two-way binding that keeps the source property and target property in complete sync.
      SOURCE_TO_TARGET
      Makes a one-way binding where the target property is set whenever the source property changes.
      TARGET_TO_SOURCE
      Makes a one-way binding where the source property is set whenever the target property changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBindSourceToTarget()
      Returns whether this bind mode can bind the source property to the target property.
      boolean canBindTargetToSource()
      Returns whether this bind mode can bind the target property to the source property.
      static BindMode valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static BindMode[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • SOURCE_TO_TARGET

        public static final BindMode SOURCE_TO_TARGET
        Makes a one-way binding where the target property is set whenever the source property changes.

      • TARGET_TO_SOURCE

        public static final BindMode TARGET_TO_SOURCE
        Makes a one-way binding where the source property is set whenever the target property changes.

      • BIDIRECTIONAL

        public static final BindMode BIDIRECTIONAL
        Makes a two-way binding that keeps the source property and target property in complete sync.

      • canBindSourceToTarget

        public boolean canBindSourceToTarget()
        Returns whether this bind mode can bind the source property to the target property.
        Returns:
        Returns true for SOURCE_TO_TARGET and BIDIRECTIONAL.

      • canBindTargetToSource

        public boolean canBindTargetToSource()
        Returns whether this bind mode can bind the target property to the source property.
        Returns:
        Returns true for TARGET_TO_SOURCE and BIDIRECTIONAL.
